body_content.explanation: in a way that is too general and that has not been carefully thought about:
examples: He sweepingly stated that most research outside of the sciences is not worth it.
"Contemporary culture has never been so interesting," he sweepingly declares.

body_content.explanation: in a way that affects many things or people:
examples: Last year, there were some sweepingly extensive service outages.
If the world is going to sweepingly incorporate renewable energy into the electricity grid, governments need to commit to funding it.
